lead_paragraph: The Cleveland Cavaliers signed the free-agent guard Devin Brown to a contract yesterday in their first off-season roster move. Brown averaged 11.6 points, 4.3 rebounds and 2.6 assists — all career highs — for the New Orleans Hornets last season.
